text_block_list.name: Mikoshi Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Mikoshi coming through! Chant with us, people! Let's hear you loud and lively!

text_block_list.name: Mikoshi Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: Here we go, Heave-ho! Heave!! Again, Heave-ho! Heave!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ah, this atmosphere always strikes a chord! I see the pulling of the mikoshi is as vivacious as ever.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The number of attendees has hit a record high. 
We, too, must gird our loins and give our all 
in our performances.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Y-Yes, ma'am…! 
It's here…… The big moment's comeeueh～…!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…… Yukino, are you okay? There's still some time left. 
How about we take a little stroll to clear your mind?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Oh, ah, uhm ——

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
…… No, I'm good!! I want to double-check the dance steps 
with Ms. Curren! I'm fine, really!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …… Alright, if you say so…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
—— Final touches all good♪ I have a feeling you're 
going to nail it and look super cute doing so, Yukino!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, Ms. Curren…! I'm so grateful 
for your support right up to the very end.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Don't mention it! I just really want to put on the most 
charming dance with you two, Yukino♪

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Curren! There you are…! They've been looking for you. 
It's time to start getting ready.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, is it that time already? Thanks for letting me know. 
Catch you later, Yukino～!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…… Yukino, you and Curren have been practicing 
a lot together after the camp, haven't you?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Uh! Well～ yeah…… since we're in the same class and all…?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Uhmmm… Ms. City, are you maybe… a l-little upset with me?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …… It's not like that, really. But you know…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
… I was hoping you'd hit me up for practice sometimes too. 
I know Curren probably had more to teach, but ——

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: No, no, it's not that at all!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
I just wanted to prove that I could be like… 
no, that I could stand beside you without 
feeling out of place… That was my goal…!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Yukino……

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Uhm… I can't quite find the right words, but I'm 
going to put everything into the Votive Dance!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: I'll be confident and hold my head high — put everything into it!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(Ms. City is so fetching no matter how many times I see 'er. 
Just plumb stunning, she is, and my role model.)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(But today, I didn't back out. I spoke me heart out! 
I'm even sharing the stage with her right now!!)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(I wish I could stand here forever! 
I want to shine just as brightly!)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(Yukino… Wow, I need to stay focused. Can't let my guard 
down now or she'll steal all the attention.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(She looks exceptionally beautiful tonight… 
—— But I'm not one to be outshone!!)

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
(Mmm～ Their tight dynamic is really on display. 
It's captivating many in the audience as well…)

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: (But guess who else is on stage? Take a good look♪)

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
…… Amazing, aren't they? City, Curren, …Yukino. 
They're so confident, so beautiful… so elegant.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah… You know, watching our seniors' Kikka Sho and such 
made me wonder if I could ever keep up, but ——

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Now I feel inspired. Yeah… I'm ready to give it my all too.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
Wow, there really aren't any targets here! All of them 
are set up on the sacred mountain…! They were serious 
about sticking to tradition?!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl D
text_block_list.text:
President Rudolf and Vice President Brian are both formidable… 
and actually kind of intimidating, but this is so thrilling…!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
(Heh, looks like Brian's idea is hitting 
the mark right off the bat ——)

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
—— Understood! You are nominating Curren Chan, Gold City, 
and Yukino Bijin for the Votive Dance, correct?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Each of them possesses their unique brilliance. 
I'm confident they will cut the mustard admirably.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Agreed! And regarding the Yabusame, the URA has specifically requested your participation. What do you think?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: If that is my duty. ……In which case, may I also vehemently suggest another participant for the Yabusame?

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Of course! And who would that be?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —— Narita Brian. She would be an invaluable ally to me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Brian, do you remember the day I brought you 
into the position of vice president?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Needless to say, I have never forgotten that day.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: —— Huh? You want me to be the vice president? … Is this some kind of joke?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm still learning how to make jokes, and Tracen students 
make for bad practice. Suffice to say I am quite serious. 
—— Brian, I want you as my vice president.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
…… I know your history. You ran the student council 
alone until last year, right?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
And your rival in the recent election… Air Groove, was it? 
She's now the vice president, I hear.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Good for you, the council has doubled in size. 
That should be enough.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm afraid not, Brian. …Now that I have a right hand, 
I've become even more ambitious. I need you by my side 
on my course to loftier goals.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Your pure horsegirl instinct, your fiery spirit… I need that, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Yabusame Announcer Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: —— The fires are lit, and the Yabusame is starting!

text_block_list.name: Yabusame Announcer Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Ready… Set………… 
—— GO!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ORAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHH!!!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
(Ha… Hahah! The excitement… It's tangible! Giving me chills! 
Brian, your ferocity, your instinct — it's always so scintillating!)

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: (And seeing you like that makes me ——)

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
What the heck… Incredible. 
… I'm shaking……!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
(Your unconcealed instinct, your unbound energy! 
It's stirring the soul of every horsegirl…!!)

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Of course, it seems I am no exception……!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Face me, "Monster"! ……Haaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Sigh… The Festival went by in a flash. It was so vibrant this year, making it all the more bittersweet to see it end ——

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Yeah… The Votive Dance by Ms. City's group and the student council duo's Yabusame were both really inspiring…… This'll be a memory to cherish.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
—— A glorious occasion indeed. 
Tonight, we honor the sacred Festival of Illustrious Equines.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
May all horsegirls remain hale and hearty. 
May their paths be graced with a glorious future.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
A glorious occasion indeed. 
Tonight, we honor the sacred Festival of Illustrious Equines ——
